For all its flaws in planning and execution, the Croat
Muslim capture of Kupres was a step in the right
direction-militarily, politically, and geographi
cally—and a step closer to both factions' ultimate
objective of Jajce. But it left unclear whether the
ARBiH and the HVO were advancing down the road
alongside each other or racing each other to the finish .
509
